New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers are off to the best start in franchise history with a 10-0 record.
Key Match Events: The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Golden State Warriors 136-117 on November 9, 2024.
The Cavaliers led 83-42 at halftime against the Warriors.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Cavaliers were expected to perform well with Donovan Mitchell's three-year, $150 million extension and Evan Mobley's improvement.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr believes Kenny Atkinson has made the Cavaliers 'clearly one of the best teams in the league'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers' shooting has been exceptional, with a 42.7 percent three-point shooting rate.
The Cavaliers' offense is currently better than Boston's historic offense from last season.
